changes.title: Bugs
items: Custom patreon icons will now appear correctly
Fixed click to tag after recent update
Fixed chat updating after recent update
Fixed change channel fresh start bug

changes.title: Features
items: Left click on username to tag in chat
Right click on username to open their profile in mobile sim
Middle Wheel click on username to copyy their user ID
The chat is stopped in case you scroll to find something you wanted to read
Windows notification when someone @tags your name
-> If you click on the notification, it will scroll you to the message
Emoji autocomplete, you can start of by writing :eyes:, arrow (up/down) navigation between suggested emojis (enter to select)
